title: Data Transformation
code:
§begin transform_data
  input ← [2, 5, 8, 11]
  output ← §create_array
  §iterate val §in input
    transformed ← val ⊕ val
    output ← output
    §transmit transformed
  §end_iterate
§end
solution_description: transforms each array element by doubling it and outputs the results
hints: Each value is doubled (added to itself)
